channel.title: notMNIST on AI for HUMANITY
channel.description: Recent content in notMNIST on AI for HUMANITY

item.title: Keras – High Level API
item.description: What is Keras? It is a high-level neural network API, written in Python and able to running on top of TensorFlow. It is a very useful API, which enables us fast experimentation. Keras acts as an interface for the TensorFlow library. The task here is to study the image classification problem using notMNIST dataset. This dataset contains images of letters from A – J inclusive (dowload here). See the figure below to get an idea;
